title: VANLIFE: Redtail Overland pops up a $20k carbon fiber rooftop “tent”
content:
Do you love rooftop camping? Does the idea of sleeping atop your vehicle in a curatively engineered tent make the hair on the back of your neck stand up? What if I told you Redtail’s rooftop camper (RTC) had more in common with a chalet than a tent? Contain yourself — literally and figuratively —

The post VANLIFE: Redtail Overland pops up a $20k carbon fiber rooftop “tent” appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Sam Anderson
